ko.already_paired: This device has already been paired.
ko.autostart_after_message: Automatically start the bridge service, in seconds.
ko.certification_benefits: Another benefit to using certified plugins is, HOOBS support. Since HOOBS tests certified plugins, we are familiar with the plugin and can help troubleshoot issues. And in the event where the plugins is broke, we can work with the plugin developer on your behalf to help address the issue.
ko.certification_program: The HOOBS certification program helps promote plugins that work. We work with the plugin developer to address issues, and help keep the plugins simple and easy to configure.
ko.config_reboot_confirm: You need to reboot for these changes to take effect.

ko.confirm_exit: Are you sure you want to leave?
ko.confirm_factory_reset: Are you sure you want to reset this device?

ko.confirm_refresh: Are you sure you want to refresh?
ko.confirm_remove: Are you sure you want to remove this device?

ko.country_code_message: 이 장치는 위치로 국가 코드를 설정합니다. 이것은 날씨 예보에 사용되는
ko.device_address: Enter the IP address your HOOBS device
ko.device_hostname: Assign a name for this device
ko.end_port_invalid: 최종 포트가 잘못되었습니다. 그것은 1에서 65535 사이의 숫자 여야합니다.
ko.factory_reset_message: This will remove all plugins, configurations and settings.
ko.help_welcome: HOOBS is an ecosystem that aims to unify and simplfy the "Smart Home". We beilive that you should be able to use the devices you want, and not be locked into one provider's solution. If you want to use Google Home for your voice control and Apple Home for your routines, go ahead, HOOBS will make tht happen for you. HOOBS can connect your devices togeather by the use of plugins. HOOBS has "Certified Plugins", and it supports Homebridge plugins. This means you have over 1,000 choices when it comes to your Smart Home tech.
